org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl
Class AeVariablesImpl

java.lang.Object
  org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.AeVariablesImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
IAeVariableContainer
public class AeVariablesImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements IAeVariableContainer

impl for the variables object that contains a map of the variables and behavior for variable initialization
